Devops Brisbane Ansible talk

24 Aug 2013

Source code

To view the slides locally, you can use:

git clone https://github.com/willthames/devops-bris-ansible.git
git checkout gh-pages
python -m SimpleHTTPServer

You don't have to use python but you'll need a webserver of some kind. You can view the slides at http://willthames.github.io/devops-bris-ansible
